headline: Allegion’s Q2 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Allegion’s second quarter was marked by robust performance in its core nonresidential Americas segment, which management credited as the primary driver behind the company’s revenue and margin strength. CEO John Stone emphasized that continued demand in institutional verticals, along with high single-digit organic growth in nonresidential, offset softness in the residential market. The electronics portfolio also contributed to segment growth, highlighted by the launch of SimonsVoss’s batteryless
